channel.title: Npc dropping items
channel.description:
ok i have this code [code]if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2591) { ItemHandler.addItem(5291, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);[/code]
but when i kill the npc it only drops 1 of that item, how do i make it drop more of it
